instruction: List three ways that space exploration has changed over the past 100 years.
output: Over the past 100 years, space exploration has been revolutionized by advancements in technology, greater international cooperation, and diversification into new areas of research, such as habitable planet searches, asteroid mining, and space tourism. Additionally, new technologies such as reusable launch vehicles, 3D printing in space, and artificial intelligence have all made space exploration significantly easier and more cost-effective.
